name: Jungle Ball Blast
description:
Jungle Ball Blast is a zuma-style game full with interesting and challenging.
You need to blast all marbles to complete levels, besides, more marbles you blast and more combos you make, higher score you will get. Please remember, don't let the chain fall into the hole.
Game features:
- Easy to learn, but difficult to become master of the game challenging.
- Many secret maps to make the game more interesting fun.
